About Us

Ẹwà Èdè Yorùbá Academy is dedicated to preserving and promoting Yoruba language, culture, and heritage through immersive education, cultural exchange, and community engagement.

[Video or Slideshow Coming Soon]

Our Classes

Novice

Perfect for those with no prior Yoruba knowledge. Learn basic greetings and phrases.

₦10,000/month

Beginner

For those who can speak a little but need guidance on pronunciation and basics.

₦15,000/month

Intermediate

Improve sentence construction and join the Yoruba speaker community.

₦20,000/month

Advanced

Practice regularly to maintain fluency and engage with the community.

₦25,000/month

Yoruba Book Club

"Ọmọ tí a kọ́ ni yóò gbé ilé tí a kọ́ tà"

The child we train will sell the house we build.

Ẹwà Èdè Yorùbá

Preserving Yoruba language and culture through education and community.
